SQL_STMT_U.val: Select UgpEntry, UgpCode, UgpName, BaseUoM from OUGP (NOLOCK) where (UgpCode = ':1' or ':1' is null or ':1' = '') :2

ExpSyntax.val: IF({0,56}='' OR ISNULL({0,56}),'',' AND UgpName LIKE '&ASCIIChr(39)&ASCIIChr(37)&Trim({0,56})&ASCIIChr(37)&ASCIIChr(39))

SQL_STMT_U.val: select O.UgpCode, O.UgpName, O.BaseUom, U.UomEntry, U.BaseQty from OUGP O join UGP1 U on O.UgpEntry = U.UgpEntry where (UgpCode = ':1' or ':1' is null or ':1' = '') :2

ExpSyntax.val: DataViewToText(0,'UgpCode,UgpName,UomNameBase,UomNameUgp1,BaseQty','UoM Group Code,UoM Group Name,Base UoM, Uom, Qty',{32768,84},';','',0)
IF({0,7}='' OR ISNULL({0,7}),'',' AND O.UgpName LIKE '&ASCIIChr(39)&ASCIIChr(37)&Trim({0,7})&ASCIIChr(37)&ASCIIChr(39))
